snippet: A 29-year-old director with only one movie under his belt got David Sedaris to agree an adaptation of his work, to be shown at Sundance.
abstract: Director Kyle Patrick Alvarez describes how he convinced David Sedaris to let him adapt his short story C. O. G. into a feature film, which will premiere at Sundance Film Festival.
lead_paragraph: A 29-year-old director with only one movie under his belt got David Sedaris to agree an adaptation of his work, to be shown at Sundance.

headline.seo: Kyle Patrick Alvarez Films ‘C.O.G.,’ by David Sedaris
headline.main: A Writer’s Strange Route to Hollywood
